tool_description: Over 10 million tourist attractions and facilities around the world
name: Places
title: Places

api_list.name: Geographic coordinates by placename
api_list.description: Returns geographic coordinates for the given placename (city, village, etc.). The method returns the place whose name is most similar to the search string.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Two-letter language code (ISO639-1). The following values are available: en (english), ru (russian)

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Two-letter country code, ISO-3166 (optional). Default is all countries.

api_list.name: Places list by radius (Nearby Search)
api_list.description: Method returns objects closest to the selected point optionally filtered by parameters. Only basic information is include in response: xid, name, kinds, osm, wikidata of each object. Depending on the chosen format, the response is either a simple array of objects (with a smaller volume) or an object in GeoJSON format.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language code (2 characters, ISO639-1). The following values are available: en (english), ru (russian)

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Maximum distance from selected point in meters

optional_parameters.name: src_attr
optional_parameters.description: The source of the object attributes. It is allowed to point multiple sources separated by commas. Objects from all sources are returned by default. Available values : osm, wikidata, snow, cultura.ru, rosnedra, user

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The output format (GeoJSON is set by default). Specify “count” to get the number of obtained objects. Available values : json, geojson, count

optional_parameters.name: kinds
optional_parameters.description: Object category. Several comma-separated categories may be stated with OR logic. Objects from all categories are returned by default. See object category hierarchy at https://dev.opentripmap.com/doc/en/

optional_parameters.name: src_geom
optional_parameters.description: The source of the object geometry. Objects from all sources are returned by default. Available values : osm, wikidata, snow, cultura.ru, rosnedra

optional_parameters.name: rate
optional_parameters.description: Minimum rating of the object popularity, 1 - minimum, 3- maximum, h - object is referred to the cultural heritage. Objects from all categories are returned by default.  Available values : 1, 2, 3, 1h, 2h, 3h

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of returned objects. 500 is set by default.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The text string on which to search at the begining of the object name (mimimum 3 characters). All objects are returned by default.

api_list.name: Places list by bounding box
api_list.description: Method returns all objects (or number of objects) in the given boundary box optionally filtered by parameters. Only basic information is include in response: xid, name, kinds, osm, wikidata of each object. Depending on the chosen format, the response is either a simple array of objects (with a smaller volume) or an object in GeoJSON format.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language code (2 characters, ISO639-1). The following values are available: en (english), ru (russian)

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The text string on which to search at the begining of the object name (mimimum 3 characters). All objects are returned by default.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The output format (GeoJSON is set by default). Specify “count” to get the number of obtained objects. Available values : json, geojson, count

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of returned objects. 500 is set by default.

optional_parameters.name: src_geom
optional_parameters.description: The source of the object geometry. Objects from all sources are returned by default. Available values : osm, wikidata, snow, cultura.ru, rosnedra

optional_parameters.name: src_attr
optional_parameters.description: The source of the object attributes. It is allowed to point multiple sources separated by commas. Objects from all sources are returned by default. Available values : osm, wikidata, snow, cultura.ru, rosnedra, user

optional_parameters.name: kinds
optional_parameters.description: Object category. Several comma-separated categories may be stated with OR logic. Objects from all categories are returned by default. See object category hierarchy at https://dev.opentripmap.com/doc/en/

optional_parameters.name: rate
optional_parameters.description: Minimum rating of the object popularity, 1 - minimum, 3- maximum, h - object is referred to the cultural heritage. Objects from all categories are returned by default.  Available values : 1, 2, 3, 1h, 2h, 3h

api_list.name: Place properties
api_list.description: Returns detailed information about the object. Objects can contain different amount of information.

required_parameters.name: xid
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the object in OpenTripMap

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Two-letter language code (ISO639-1). The following values are available: en (english), ru (russian)

api_list.name: Autosuggest
api_list.description: Method returns suggestions for search term closest to the selected point optionally filtered by parameters. Only basic information is include in response: xid, name, kinds, osm, wikidata of each object. Depending on the chosen format, the response is either a simple array of objects (with a smaller volume) or an object in GeoJSON format.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The query term on which to search.

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Maximum distance from selected point in meters

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language code (2 characters, ISO639-1). The following values are available: en (english), ru (russian)

optional_parameters.name: kinds
optional_parameters.description: Object category. Several comma-separated categories may be stated with OR logic. Objects from all categories are returned by default. See object category hierarchy at https://dev.opentripmap.com/doc/en/

optional_parameters.name: rate
optional_parameters.description: Minimum rating of the object popularity, 1 - minimum, 3- maximum, h - object is referred to the cultural heritage. Objects from all categories are returned by default.  Available values : 1, 2, 3, 1h, 2h, 3h

optional_parameters.name: src_attr
optional_parameters.description: The source of the object attributes. It is allowed to point multiple sources separated by commas. Objects from all sources are returned by default. Available values : osm, wikidata, snow, cultura.ru, rosnedra, user

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The output format (GeoJSON is set by default). Specify “count” to get the number of obtained objects. Available values : json, geojson

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of returned objects. 500 is set by default.

optional_parameters.name: src_geom
optional_parameters.description: The source of the object geometry. Objects from all sources are returned by default. Available values : osm, wikidata, snow, cultura.ru, rosnedra
